About.title: Agustin Maurel
About.subtitle: Front-end Developer
About.description: I am a front-end developer with full stack knowledge, but with a lot of inclination and love for front-end. I like to work in a team, share ideas to learn and develop a product that contributes to solve any problem or need of people.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: Welcome to my portfolio, since I immersed myself in this world I had the privilege to study, learn, teach and accompany new students until the development of a start up from its inception to its conception.
Experience.description2: What I enjoy most is learning how to create software by working as a team to get to the point where design and functionality come together: things that look good but are also well built under the hood”,

musure.title: Front-end Dev MUSURE world
musure.description: Development of a 3D creation tool focused on helping content creators and gamers to monetize their work, working together with design team, economics, product through SCRUM methodology In charge of the frontend.

henry.title: Full-Stack Teach-Assistant
henry.description: Full-Stack teacher assistant, bootcamp assistant for full-stack students. Experience where I had the opportunity to coordinate and integrate study groups, guide and assist in problem solving and promote group work. I was also able to contribute ideas for the improvement of the bootcamp.

Recommendations.title: Recomendaciones
Recommendations.intro: Some testimonials from colleagues or ex-colleagues about my work and their experience together.

tano.title: Tano Bevacqua Cossa
tano.subtitle: Founder & CEO of MUSURE
tano.description: Maurel is an amazing team player. A developer that always wanted to have in my team. A problem solver. A lean thinker. A person I really appreciate and I wish to continue work together!. Thanks for everything you did for MUSURE world and let's continue to rock the Metaverse!!

nico.title: Nico Constantin
nico.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
nico.description: It has been a pleasure to work with Agustín in MUSURE world and in other projects we work with.He is a collaborative person, problem-solving and always willing to face new challenges and learn. He also writes code that is easily readable, clean and always with maintainability and scalability in mind.

fer.title: Fernando Gabriel Villabrille
fer.subtitle: Diseñador de Producto, Gráfico & Multimedial
fer.description: He was a valuable team member, possessing expertise and a proactive approach to problem-solving. His teamwork and effective communication with the UX team helped reach our goals.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.intro: In my career I have learned the following soft skills and techniques for solution development and teamwork.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.intro: Through my projects, I seek to learn and look for new challenges, as well as to improve the user experience and optimize processes. In this way I try to keep myself updated on the latest development trends and apply best practices at every stage of the software lifecycle.

coco.title: COCO Mall | Shopping online
coco.description: Coco Mall is an online store, a marketplace where you can shop in different stores or create your own store to sell your products. It has a lot of features for both the customer user and the business owner, an administrator panel and payment management.

turnify.title: Turnify
turnify.description: Turnify is an appointment app integrated with WhatsApp, an innovative solution that allows users to easily book appointments and manage appointments. It also has a dedicated app for administrators in any field, facilitating the management and organization of services.
